RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 84. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONNECTTHECAUSEWAY perfect inside trip to far turn, angled four wide and led in the stretch and all out to hold sway to the wire. CARIBBEAN NIGHT no speed to the half, rallied into far turn and stretch outkicked. WICKED INTENT good position to far turn, steady gain into the stretch, mildly. COMMANDERS PALACE raced along evenly with no late punch when needed late going. BLUE NEITH speed to the front quickly dueled from half to stretch, faltered. HAPPYKIYAY good position to far turn, shuffled back while no late run. GRAN CHEMIN chased, dueled to far turn with nothing left in the drive. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Neith
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front quickly dueled from half to stretch, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Caribbean Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: had an awkward start, rallied into far turn and stretch outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Happykiyay
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn, shuffled back while no late run

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Chemin
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, dueled to far turn with nothing left in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Commanders Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late punch when needed late going

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Intent
ENTRY.OWNER: Kleparchuk Victor Kleparchuk Mike Dohei Eric and Rettschlag Adam
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn, steady gain into the stretch, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Connectthecauseway
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect inside trip to far turn, angled four wide, led held sway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRONG DEMAND raced between horses around first turn, inside run down the backstretch and rallied well clear under good handling to the wire. EXPLOSIVE SKIES no speed while saving ground to far turn, rallied along for place, no match for winner. PONDERED chased leader from inside, took over far turn, weakened for show. MACI'S GEMSTONE no speed throughout, widest run past quarter pole while no menace. UNCOMMON GRACE was through early and dropped far back readily in the stretch and returned bleeding, walked off. MAE BEE RIGHT sprinted off to long lead but stopped to a walk far back at wire while vanned off following the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Explosive Skies
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed while saving ground to far turn, rallied along for place

ENTRY.NAME: Maci's Gemstone
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Tommy C and Heyer Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed throughout, widest run past quarter pole, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Pondered
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader from inside, took over far turn, weakened for show

ENTRY.NAME: Mae Bee Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted off to long lead but stopped to a walk far back at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Demand
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses first turn, inside backstretch, rallied well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Uncommon Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, dropped far back readily, returned bleeding

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEAM FEISTY chased leader to quarter pole, rallied past stretch to go clear. MISS HIGH N MIGHTY tracked to turn, three wide run into stretch for place spot. AUGURI sprinted clear outside to turn, weakened in late stretch for show. KINGMAKING (GB) raced evenly behind top three to the stretch with no late kick. CASINO ANNIE never factored throughout. PROVOLONE never a menace throughout. FELLA'S SISTER had an awkward start, always outrun. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Team Feisty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to quarter pole, rallied past stretch to go clear

ENTRY.NAME: Miss High N Mighty
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked to turn, three wide run into stretch for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Casino Annie
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Kingmaking (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly behind top three to the stretch with no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Provolone
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, never a menace throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Auguri
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear outside to turn, weakened in late stretch for show

ENTRY.NAME: Fella's Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from gate, never threatened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPPY HOUR sprinted clear at once while well handled throughout as much the best to the wire. PARKER raced back to far turn, rallied along for place spot, bested rest. WHEREWEGOIN chased winner to far turn and nothing left in the drive, showed. BRODYTHEOXMAN tracked top pair to far turn, faded back in the stretch run. SAVING MAMA broke slow and always well back.

ENTRY.NAME: Saving Mama
ENTRY.COMMENT: always well back and never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Wherewegoin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to far turn and nothing left in the drive, showed

ENTRY.NAME: Cappy Hour
ENTRY.OWNER: Adams James M and Cox Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear at once, well handled throughout, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Parker
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to far turn, rallied along for place spot, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Brodytheoxman
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked top pair to far turn, faded back in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1 1/16M Turf CR: 81. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 21, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $ 4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIVE IT UP inside speed to the front, well handled throughout and held sway to the wire. PRESSLY'S HOPE chased winner throughout with a mild bid in the stretch run. HONEY BOURBON off rail to far turn, rallied between horses in stretch for show. PRINCESS NINA off rail chasing throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. CELESTIAL SPIN off rail trip with no response when needed in the stretch run. ALMADRINA (GB) good position to far turn with nothing left in the stretch run. NORTHERN ALLIANCE never a factor throughout. SHESMYBROKER through early, dropped back readily. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, well handled throughout, held sway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 21, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU'RE A DANDY tracked leader to turn, cruised past in hand, shaken up in the upper stretch and prevailed. AWESOME VALOR inside speed to the front, headed past quarter pole, stayed game. OPTIMIZME outsprinted from the gate, kept on for show spot to the wire. MAXIMUM JOY dropped back quickly while no menace. LUCKY CAT TOO broke sharp, could not keep up and faded back quickly. Race was hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: Optimizme
ENTRY.COMMENT: outsprinted from the gate, kept on for show spot to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, headed past quarter pole, stayed game

ENTRY.NAME: Maximum Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back quickly while no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Cat Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, could not keep up and faded back quickly

ENTRY.NAME: You're a Dandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader to turn, cruised past in hand, shaken up prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 53. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 21, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Pref erence To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PALACE TEMPTATION tracked to the turn, rallied through the stretch to edge clear in the final stages under stout handling. MAN'S CHOICE no speed to the turn, ran up outside and dueled but outkicked to the wire. WHISKEY HELPS inside trip while never far back, kept on in the stretch for show. CONSTITUTION COAL between horses to front, led past quarter pole, folded stretch. SHOWTIME BOY quick from gate outside, could not keep up and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Helps
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip while never far back, kept on in the stretch for show

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked to the turn, rallied through the stretch to edge clear

ENTRY.NAME: Constitution Coal
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to front, led past quarter pole, folded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Man's Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, ran up outside, dueled outkicked to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Showtime Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick from gate outside, could not keep up and dropped back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1 1/16M Turf CR: 87. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 21, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not C onsidered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHERE'D THE DAY GO quick to the front outside, well rationed throughout, held sway to the wire. LORD REVELSTOKE never far back early on, took up chase while no match to wire. NOBLE PURSUIT unhurried early on, angled out far turn, late run to cut the gap. CACAHUETE pressed pace throughout with no late response when needed. ENGLISH CLASSIC no speed to far turn with no late response when needed. HOLIDAY DANCER between horses first turn, could not keep up and faded back. ERIC THE SALESMAN saved ground to no avail throughout. HONEST TO GOODNESS through after three quarters. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Where'd the Day Go
ENTRY.OWNER: Donovitch Kevin W Rodriguez Eduardo M and Joy Kyle S
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front outside, well rationed throughout, held sway

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace throughout with no late response when needed

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to no avail throughout
